Read data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
data = read.csv('data/APCs.csv')
head(data)
```

:::


Clean data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
data$apc_.lower = as.numeric(data$apc_.lower)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning: NAs introduced by coercion
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
data$apc_.upper = as.numeric(data$apc_.upper)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning: NAs introduced by coercion
```


:::
:::


Plot


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data) + geom_violin(aes(parent_publisher, apc_.lower, fill=parent_publisher))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning: Removed 15 rows containing non-finite values (`stat_ydensity()`).
```
